tool_description: Analysing text sentiment by passing text or paragraphs, in single line or multiple lines, and get back with the sentiment analysis report, to get how many of lines be analysed, how many positive, negative, middle sentiment for the lines of text.
name: Text Sentiment Analysis Method
title: Text Sentiment Analysis Method
